NessieExceptionException raised by a NessieOcr object
NessieOcrManager of the optical character recognition process
PatternSet of pixels that defines a pattern to be recognized as a character in classification stage
PlainTextDatasetDataset built by retrieving the data from a plain text file in the filesystem
